text: Octavia Leonare Spencer (born May 25, 1970) is an American actress. She has won several awards, including an Academy Award, a British Academy Film Award, and a Golden Globe Award, and is the first black actress to receive two consecutive Oscar nominations == Life == Octavia Spencer was born in Montgomery, Alabama. She has six brothers and sisters. 1988, she went to the Jefferson Davis High School and in this school she did her high school graduation. == Filmography == * 1996: A Time to Kill * 1998: ER (TV Series) * 1999: Blue Streak * 1999: Never Been Kissed * 1999: Chicago Hop (TV Series) * 1999: The X-Files (TV Series) * 2000: Just Shoot Me! * 2000: Big Momma's House * 2000: Becker * 2000: Malcolm in the Middle * 2001: Grounded for Life (TV Series) * 2001: Dharma & Greg (TV Series) * 2001,2002: Titus (TV Series) * 2002,2005: NYPD Blue (TV Series) * 2003: S.W.A.T. * 2003: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde * 2004: Win a Date with Tad Hamilton * 2004-2005: LAX (TV Series) * 2005: Beauty Shop * 2005: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous * 2005: CSI: NY * 2005: Medium * 2007: Ugly Betty * 2008: Seven Pounds * 2008: Wizards of Waverly Place * 2008: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation (TV Series) * 2008: The Big Bang Theory * 2009: Just Peck * 2009: Halloween II * 2010: The Dennis Sch√§fner Show * 2010: Dinner for Schmucks * 2011: Flypaper * 2011: The Help * 2012: Smashed * 2017: The Shape of Water Category:1970 births Category:American movie actors Category:American Academy Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:Living people Category:Actors from Montgomery, Alabama
title: Octavia Spencer
